PRODUCT NAME: 400ML SUS316 Light Weight One Touch Bottle
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- SUS316 inner bottle, suitable for sports beverages.                                     
- Vacuum insulated keep hot or cold longer.               
- Lightweight one touch bottle.         
- "Safety Lock" - safe to carry around without leaking.  
- Simple stopper design. Easy to clean the stopper and gaskets thoroughly.
- Easy to drink mouth design. The water flow from the drinking mouth is more concentrate than previous model.                               
- Slide to open design-easy to enjoy your beverages with one hand.                      
- Slide to lock-leak proof safety lock design. 
- With 44mm diameter mouth width, large ice cube easily put into bottle.

- Hot Retention (6HRS) : Above 59° C 
- Hot Retention (1HRS) : Above 85° C
- Cold Retention (6HRS) : Below 10° C
